DOC.brief_title: A Pharmacokinetic Study Three Different Particle Sizes PH-797804
DOC.criteria: Healthy male subject and/or healthy female subject nonchild bear potential age 18 55 year ( inclusive ) . Healthy define clinically relevant abnormality identify detailed medical history , full physical examination , include blood pressure pulse rate measurement , 12lead ECG clinical laboratory test . Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 17.5 30.5 kg/m2 ; total body weight > 50 kg ( 110 lb ) . Evidence history clinically significant hematological , renal , endocrine , pulmonary , gastrointestinal , cardiovascular , hepatic , psychiatric , neurologic , allergic disease ( include drug allergy , exclude untreated , asymptomatic , seasonal allergy time dose ) . A positive urine drug screen . History regular alcohol consumption exceed 14 drinks/week male .
